itemLabel: Judith Blake, Baroness Blake of Leeds

wikipedia_page.main:
Judith Vivienne Blake, Baroness Blake of Leeds CBE (née Parsons) is a British Labour politician serving as a life peer in the House of Lords since 2021. She serves on the opposition front bench as a Shadow Spokesperson for Housing, Communities and Local Government and an Opposition Whip.
Blake served as the leader of Leeds City Council from 2015 to 2021, becoming the first woman to hold the position.

response: *Judith Blake, Baroness Blake of Leeds - former Labour Leader of Leeds City Council
Blake's mother Judith Blake, Baroness Blake of Leeds is a Labour politician who led Leeds City Council from 2015 to 2021. She is married to Lewis Dagnall, a Sheffield City Councillor.
